1.text: Keep unopened peanut butter a cool, dark pantry for up to 9 months.

2.text: Store opened peanut butter in the pantry for 2-3 months.

3.text: Put opened jars of peanut butter in the fridge to add 6-9 months of shelf life.

4.text: Freeze portioned peanut butter in an airtight container for 6-9 months.

5.text: Store sealed jars in the pantry for 2-3 months.

6.text: Place the jar upside down so the oil doesn't settle on the bottom.

7.text: Keep opened jars of natural peanut butter in the fridge for 5-6 months.

8.text: Freeze all-natural peanut butter for up to 9 months.
